tags: The Government of Canada employs the Aristotle Language Translation Services (ALTS) to assist in translating the content of this announcement.
full_summary:
### Detailed Tender Information
#### Tender Title
NPP - S4790197 - THS SA: Temporary Help Services against the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR)

* Date of Publication: January 23, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: January 30, 2024, 13:00 (EST)
* Expected Contract Start Date: February 12, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: January 10, 2025

#### Solicitation Details
* Solicitation Number: S4790197
* Amendment Number: 3
* Publication Date: January 23, 2024
* Tender Status: Expired

#### Service Description
The Department of National Defense (DND) requires Temporary Help Services from qualified suppliers under EN578-172870. The requirement is for Stream 13—Policy and advisory services, 13.8 Sociology.

* Description of the Requirement: 
DND has a requirement for Temporary Help Services, and tenderers must be qualified under the required streams and categories.

#### Cost and Security
* Security Clearance Required: Secret
* Procurement Category: SRV
* Trade Agreements: 
  • Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
  • Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

#### Supplier Information
* The following Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders have been invited to submit a proposal:
  * 3056058 Canada inc.
  * A Hundred Answers Inc.
  * Akkodeis Canada Inc.
  * Cache Computer Consulting Corp.
  * CGI Information Systems and Management Consultants Inc.
  * Deloitte Inc.
  * DLS Technology Corporation
  * IT/Net, Ottawa Inc.
  * Makwa Resourcing Inc. and Koroc Consulting Inc. (Joint Venture)
  * Maplesoft Consulting Inc.
  * Olav Consulting Corp.
  * Protak Consulting Group Inc.
  * Spirit Personnel Inc.
  * Taligent Consulting Inc.
  * Turtle Island Staffing Inc.

#### Contact Information
* CFSG(O-G) Temp Help
* cfsgo-gtemporaryhelp-gsfcpgdaniiedaquiettemp-Cision-forces-gc-ca
* 613-971-7955

#### Attachments
